text: ārau tē'ōm̐ra sampradāẏara lōkasakala tē'ōm̐ra ōcarata udabhraānta hai guci āhila ārau āgara paraā'i siham̐ta asaṯkarmata lipta āchila. Tē'ōm̐ ka’lē, ‘hē mōra sampradāẏa! Iham̐ta mōra kan'yā, tōmālōkara bābē iham̐tēhē bēchi paraitra. Gatikē tōmālōkē āllāhara tākbaraā aralambana karaā ārau mōra atithi sambandhē mōka lajjita nakaraibā. Tōmālōkara mājata ējanō sādhu byakti nā'inē’
